title: The King of Fighters XIII [TaitoTypeX2 Emulated]
description:
The King of Fighters XIII - TaitoTypeX2 Emulated

This is the arcade original game "The King of Fighters XIII" emulated for PC.
To this version has been added a Launcher to configure the arcade machine emulator, and to run the game.

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

The minimum system requirements are as follows:

-	OPERATING SYSTEM: Microsoft Windows XP, Vista or 7
-	CPU: Dual core CPU 2.0 Ghz
-	RAM: 1GB
-	GRAPHICS: NVIDIA 8800 series or ATI 3800 with 256MB video memory
-	SOUND: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista or 7 compatible sound card (100% DirectX 9.0c -compatible)
-	HARD DRIVE: 5GB free disk space

The recommended system requirements are as follows:

-	OPERATING SYSTEM: Microsoft Windows 7
-	CPU: Dual core CPU 2.5 GHz
-	RAM: 4GB
-	GRAPHICS: NVIDIA 9800 series or ATI 4800 series with 512MB+
-	SOUND: Microsoft Windows XP/Vista or 7 compatible sound card (100% DirectX 9.0c -compatible)
-	HARD DRIVE: 5 GB free disk space

INSTALATION NOTES

1.	Execute "Install The King of Fighters XIII.exe"
2.	.NET Framework 4 is requeired to run the launcher (It will be installed if is not detected).
3.	Follow the instalation instruction.
4.	Run the Launcher from the Link on the Desktop.

OTHER NOTES

-	The emulator do not support joystic. To play with joystic can use a free application like "JoyToKey".
